short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw a chart based on the performance goals' progress

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension draws a chart based on the performance goal's progress, avoid scrolling into the whole page to review the progress of each task, just click on the extension and get the chart.
